methods.name: sap.fe.actions.operations.callActionImport

returnValue.description: Promise resolves with an array of response objects (TODO: to be changed)

parameters.name: sActionName
parameters.description: The name of the action import to be called

parameters.name: oModel
parameters.description: An instance of an OData v4 model

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Optional, can contain the following attributes:

parameters.name: actionParameters
parameters.description: a map of parameters to be sent with the action import

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: a human-readable label for the action

parameters.name: showActionParameterDialog
parameters.description: [false] if set and if parameters exist the user retrieves a dialog to fill in parameters, if actionParameters are passed they are shown to the user

parameters.name: onSubmitted
parameters.description: Function which is called once the actions are submitted with an array of promises

methods.description: Calls an action import

methods.name: sap.fe.actions.operations.callBoundAction

returnValue.description: Promise resolves with an array of response objects (TODO: to be changed)

parameters.name: sActionName
parameters.description: The name of the action to be called

parameters.name: contexts
parameters.description: Either one context or an array with contexts for which the action shall be called

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Optional, can contain the following attributes:

parameters.name: actionParameters
parameters.description: a map of parameters to be sent for every action call

parameters.name: showActionParameterDialog
parameters.description: [false] if set and if parameters exist the user retrieves a dialog to fill in parameters, if actionParameters are passed they are shown to the user

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: a human-readable label for the action

parameters.name: invocationGrouping
parameters.description: [Isolated] mode how actions shall be called: Changeset to put all action calls into one changeset, Isolated to put them into separate changesets

parameters.name: onSubmitted
parameters.description: Function which is called once the actions are submitted with an array of promises

parameters.name: parentControl
parameters.description: if specified the dialogs are added as dependent of the parent control

methods.description: Calls a bound action for one or multiple contexts

symbols.name: sap.fe.model.DraftModel
symbols.description:
Static Draft 2.0 Model transformation for sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel to simplify programming against the draft enabled OData services with sapui5



References:
  • sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel

experimental.text:
This module is only for experimental use!
This is only a POC and maybe deleted

methods.name: isDraftModel

returnValue.description: True if Draft Model

parameters.name: oModel
parameters.description: OData v4 model instance

methods.description:
Check if this is a draft model.

A model is considered a draft model if at least one entitySet of the OData service is annotated with one of the terms

  • com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.DraftRoot
  • com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.DraftNode

methods.name: upgrade

returnValue.description: Resolves once the model is upgraded

parameters.name: oModel
parameters.description: OData v4 model instance

throws.description: Will throw an error if the service doesn't have any draft entity sets

methods.description:
Upgrades an OData v4 model to a Draft Model. Throws an error if it is not a draft enabled service

The result of this function will mix new functions into instances of the following classes

  • sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel
  • sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context
Read the sections sap.fe.model.DraftModel.upgradedModel and sap.fe.model.DraftModel.upgradedContext for more information about the added functions

examples.data:
Example: Example usage of upgrade

var oModel = new ODataModel(...);
DraftModel.upgrade(oModel).then(function() {
	oView.setModel(oModel);
	oView.setModel(oModel.getDraftAccessModel(), "$draft");
});

methods.name: upgradeOnDemand

returnValue.description: True if Draft Model detected and upgraded

parameters.name: oModel
parameters.description: OData v4 model instance

methods.description:
Upgrades an OData v4 model to a Draft Model if it is a draft enbled service and leave it as is if not.

References:

  • sap.fe.model.DraftModel#upgrade for more information

nodes.name: sap.fe.model.DraftModel.EDITSTATE
nodes.description: Enum for edit state of a document in an draft enabled service collection. Allows to simplify filtering on a set of documents as described by the individual state

nodes.name: sap.fe.model.DraftModel.upgradedContext
nodes.description: Only for documentation of the methods that are mixed into the sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context if the context is part of a draft entitySet

nodes.description: Only for documentation of the methods that are mixed into the sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel after it has been upgraded to a sap.fe.model.DraftModel

symbols.description: Enum for edit state of a document in an draft enabled service collection. Allows to simplify filtering on a set of documents as described by the individual state

properties.name: sap.fe.model.DraftModel.EDITSTATE.ALL
properties.description: Active documents that don't have a corresponding draft and all own draft documents

properties.name: sap.fe.model.DraftModel.EDITSTATE.LOCKED
properties.description: Active documents that are locked by other users

properties.name: sap.fe.model.DraftModel.EDITSTATE.UNCHANGED
properties.description: Active documents that don't have a draft document

properties.name: sap.fe.model.DraftModel.EDITSTATE.UNSAVED_CHANGES
properties.description: Active documents that have draft documents by other users

experimental.text: This module is only for experimental use!

methods.name: executeDraftActivationAction

returnValue.description: Resolve function returns the context of the operation

methods.description: Activates a draft document. The draft will replace the sibling entity and will be deleted by the backend

methods.name: executeDraftEditAction

returnValue.description: Resolve function returns the context of the operation

parameters.name: preserveChanges
parameters.description:
• true - existing changes from another user that are not locked are preserved and an error message (http status 409) is send from the backend
  • false - existing changes from another user that are not locked are overwritten

methods.description: Creates a new draft from an active document

returnValue.description: Resolve function returns the context of the operation

parameters.description: Limits the prepare activities to a given side effects group specified by this qualifier

methods.description: Execute a preparation action

returnValue.description: Resolve function returns the context of the operation

methods.description: Executes validation of a draft function

experimental.text: This module is only for experimental use!

methods.name: getDraftAccessModel

returnValue.description: The interal DraftAccessModel

methods.description: Mixin for sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel. Returns the internal JSON Model aka DraftAccessModel

examples.data:
Example: The model can be set to a control or view as any other model

oView.setModel(oModel.getDraftAccessModel(), "$draft");
